title: Property-Preservation-Plus
description: Project Overview Property Preservation Plus is a full-featured property management application. It allows users to manage properties, tenants, maintenance requests, leases, and financial records. The system also includes role-based access control and integrates weather data from the OpenWeather API.

title: Bit Buddy
description: BitBuddy is a cryptocurrency platform built with Flask that allows users to buy, sell, and stake cryptocurrencies, as well as providing access to real-time market data through blockchain and external APIs.

title: GG-Giggle Gate
description: HiSinatra is a lightweight web application built with the Sinatra framework. It features user authentication, joke categories fetched from an external API, and the ability to save and manage favorite jokes. The project uses ActiveRecord for database management and BCrypt for secure password storage.

title: Distributed Food Ordering System in Erlang
description: Welcome to the Distributed Food Ordering System built in Erlang! üöÄ This project demonstrates a simple client-server architecture where a client can order food items from a server. Each order deducts from the client's balance until they run out of money. üç≤üí∏

title: Grocery Inventory Management System
description: Welcome to the Grocery Store Inventory Manager project! This application is built using Python and Streamlit, providing a seamless and interactive way to manage grocery store inventory across multiple categoriesüçèüçñü•¶üçû.

title: PWA Dice Rolls app
description: Dice Roller is a PWA that can work offline once downloaded to your Ios or Android device. This allows users to continue using the server whether they have internet or not.

title: Pokedex-React
description: Welcome to your first generation Pokedex! This project is a React application that fetches and displays information about the first 151 Pok√©mon from the Pok√©API. Users can see each Pok√©mon's name and their first ability.

title: Loyalty Point Checkout System
description: Welcome to the Loyalty Point Checkout System! This project is a Ruby-based system for managing customer checkouts and rewards. The system prompts users for their information, processes their checkouts, and calculates rewards based on their purchases.

title: Jobly-Express
description: Jobly is a RESTful API for managing job listings and company information. It offers full CRUD operations and follows RESFTUL best practices.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A website built entirely in Python to showcase coding projects and apps.

title: Markov Text generator
description: Welcome to the Markov Text Generator! This project uses a Markov chain to generate random text based on an input file or URL.

title: PDF Templates
description: A script that generates PDF templates of multiple pages given some predefined guidelines.

title: PDF Invoices
description: A script that reads invoice records from Excel files and automatically generates PDF invoices.

title: React-Virtual-Pet
description: Welcome to the Virtual Pet Game! In this fun and interactive REACT game, you get to take care of your very own digital pet. Feed it, play with it, and ensure it stays happy and energetic!

title: Thai Food Yum Restaurant
description: Welcome to the Thai Food Yum Restaurant website project built with PHP! This repository contains the code for a fictional Thai restaurant's website, featuring delicious dishes and a user-friendly interface. üçúü•ó

title: Distance Converter
description: A program that will take take km's and convert them to miles and vice versa you can save the history of calcuations as well. It is a GUI tkinter app.

title: Minesweeper-Perl
description: Welcome to Minesweeper, the classic puzzle game built with Perl and Tk! Test your logic and reflexes as you uncover cells in a grid, avoiding hidden mines. üí£

title: Statistical Calculator API
description: Welcome to the Statistical Calculator API! This project is a simple yet powerful RESTful API built with Node.js and Express.js. It provides endpoints to calculate the mean, median, and mode of a list of numbers.

title: Real-time Cryptocurrency Price Dashboard
description: Welcome to the Real-time Cryptocurrency Price Dashboard! This Streamlit app allows users to track the latest prices and 24-hour changes of various cryptocurrencies. The app provides an intuitive and visually appealing interface for monitoring real-time cryptocurrency data

title: Adventurers Guild Registration System
description: Welcome to the Adventurers Guild Registration System! This project is a OOP focused Java application for registering adventurers, setting their ranks, and class specifications.

title: QR code Generator JS
description: This project is a simple QR code generator that takes a URL input from the user and generates a QR code image file (qr_img.png) and a text file (URL.txt) containing the URL.

title: Todo App
description: A distraction-free web app to help you focus on creating and completing tasks.
